alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 03 at 3:44PM MST until March 05 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM SATURDAY TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches, with up to 12 inches above pass level. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph at times. * WHERE...Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena Summit, and Copper Basin. * WHEN...From 8 AM Saturday to 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to blowing and drifting snow, as well as low visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sun Valley Region
